title: German court convicts ISIS bride for 'crimes against humanity' in death of 5-year-old Yazidi 'slave'
content:
1. German court convicts ISIS bride for 'crimes against humanity' in death of 5-year-old Yazidi 'slave'  The Washington Post
  2. German IS woman jailed for Yazidi girl's death in Iraq  BBC News
  3. German court jails IS woman for Yazidi girl’s death in Iraq  The Guardian
  4. German court sentences ISIS bride to 10 years in prison for allegedly letting Yazidi girl kept as slave die of thirst  CBS News
  5. German Woman Convicted of a Crime Against Humanity in Death of Yazidi Child  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ドイツの裁判所、ISISの花嫁に「人道に対する罪」で有罪判決 5歳のヤジディ「奴隷」の死で
德国法院以 "反人类罪 "判决ISIS新娘杀死5岁的雅兹迪 "奴隶"。
德國法院以 "反人類罪 "判決ISIS新娘殺死5歲的雅茲迪 "奴隸"。
